issues.details: Trump claimed the suspect was wounded and that the soldiers would face harsh consequences, which may be seen as politicizing the incident.
Governor stated conflicting information about the soldiersâ€™ condition, leading to uncertainty.

responses.clarification: Governor said he would provide additional information once more complete details were available.
Suspect is in serious condition but alive; federal official attack charges will apply.

confirmed_facts: Two National Guard soldiers were shot near the White House on 26 November 2025.
Both soldiers are in critical condition.
One suspect was arrested and is in serious but non-fatal condition.
Suspect faces federal official attack charges.
Incident occurred at 2:20 PM local time at the Westgate West Virginia station entrance.
unconfirmed_allegations: Conflicting reports about the exact condition of the soldiers.
Unverified claims about the suspectâ€™s identity beyond being a single individual.

timeline.event: Shooting of two National Guard soldiers near the White House at 2:20 PM.
Suspect arrested and wounded; suspect in serious condition.
Governor Patrick Morris issued statements about conflicting reports.
FBI Director ìºì‹œ íŒŒí…” clarified suspectâ€™s condition and charges.
